name: qBittorrent
description: Feature-rich BitTorrent client with advanced features and modern web UI.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  qbittorrent:
    image: lscr.io/linuxserver/qbittorrent:latest
    container_name: qbittorrent
    environment:
      - PUID={{PUID}}
      - PGID={{PGID}}
      - TZ={{TZ}}
      - WEBUI_PORT={{WEBUI_PORT}}
    volumes:
      - {{CONFIG_PATH}}:/config
      - {{DOWNLOADS_PATH}}:/downloads
    ports:
      - {{WEBUI_PORT}}:{{WEBUI_PORT}}
      - 6881:6881
      - 6881:6881/udp
    restart: unless-stopped
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=qbittorrent"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=download"

notes: Initial password will be shown in container logs: docker logs qbittorrent
